name: Bit Barricade
description:
[Play in full screen for best experience]

You are the latest generation in firewall technology, but the evil hackers of the world won't take it lying down. They've launched a revolutionary DDOS in your direction, a swarm of packets with malicious injector code designed to warp and mutate your operating code.

Survive waves of malicious packets using your area of effect packet spikes in this fresh take on classic missile defence games of the past!
